| History                 = The ''Centerville Globe'' is the major newspaper in [[Centerville]], [[California (State)|California]]. After high school, both [[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|Patsy Walker]] and [[Hedy Wolfe (Earth-616)|Hedy Wolfe]] began working here under [[Ted Trent (Earth-616)|Ted Trent]], the editor-in-chief.{{r|Patsy Walker Vol 1 116}}{{r|Patsy and Hedy Vol 1 98}}

| Notes                   = * As it was revealed in {{cl|Defenders #89}} that Patsy's teenage years were fictionalized into a comic book written by her mother, it is possible that the ''Centerville Globe'' is a work of fiction. However, as some of the events in Patsy's youth have been specified as happening on [[Earth-616]], the ''Globe's'' existence is suspect but unexplored.
